snippet: “End of the Rainbow,” a critically praised musical drama about Judy Garland trying one more comeback, will close on Aug. 19.
abstract: Broadway musical End of the Rainbow will close after 160 previews and 160 regular performances at the Belasco Theater.
lead_paragraph: “End of the Rainbow,” a critically praised musical drama about Judy Garland trying one more comeback, will close on Aug. 19.

headline.main: It’s the End for ‘End of the Rainbow’
headline.print_headline: It’s the End for ‘End of the Rainbow’
